Uses of Interface
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.function.IAeFunction

Packages that use IAeFunction
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.config This package contains the base classes for configuring the BPEL engine.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.impl.javascript This package contains classes which support running expressions written in JavaScript.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.impl.xquery This package contains classes which support running expressions written in XQuery.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.function   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl This package contains the base classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr.xpath This package contains classes which support running expressions written in XPath This implementation uses the Jaxen library in order to run expressions written in the XPath language. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.function   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.function.attachment

          Implements a simple Jaxen function that writes its arguments to the Java console.

          Implements a simple Jaxen function that prompts the user for console input and returns the user's input.
protected static class AeUtilityFunctionContext.AeSleepFunction
          Implements a simple Jaxen function that puts the current thread to sleep.

          Base class for attachment functions

 class AeCopyAttachmentFunction
          Class representing the function used by expression evaluators to handle the BPEL - copyAttachment(fromVarname, fromItemNumber, toVarname) fromVarname string containing the name of the source variable.
 class AeCreateAttachmentFunction
          Class representing the function used by expression evaluators to handle the BPEL - createAttachment(varname, mimeType, encodedContent, [contentType]) function call.
 class AeGetAttachmentCountFunction
          Class representing the function used by expression evaluators to handle the BPEL - getAttachmentCount(varname) function call.
 class AeGetAttachmentPropertyFunction
          Class representing the function used by expression evaluators to handle the BPEL - getAttachmentProperty(varname,itemNumber,propertyName) function call.
 class AeGetAttachmentSizeFunction
          Class representing the function used by expression evaluators to handle the BPEL - getAttachmentSize(varname,itemNumber) function call.
 class AeGetAttachmentTypeFunction
          Class representing the function used by expression evaluators to handle the BPEL - getAttachmentType(varname,itemNumber) function call.
 class AeRemoveAllAttachmentsFunction
          Class representing the function used by expression evaluators to handle the BPEL - removeAllAttachments(varnames) function call.
 class AeRemoveAttachmentFunction
          Class representing the function used by expression evaluators to handle the BPEL - removeAttachment(varname,itemNumber) function call.
 class AeReplaceAttachmentFunction
          Class representing the function used by expression evaluators to handle the BPEL - replaceAttachment(fromVarname, fromItemNumber,toVarname, toItemNumber) function call.
